short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Stock Performer users to retrieve sales data from their agencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stock Performer does not require its users to submit their agency passwords. Instead, it retrieves the sales data while users are logged into their agency accounts. (While logged out, Stock Performer can never access that data.) This Chrome plugin enables Stock Performer to do that.
